file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-27-02-03 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to lubricate the baggage-compartment check valves. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CLASS-C BAGGAGE BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK 21-27-02-600-801-A ♦ COMPARTMENT VALVES - LUBRICATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-27-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-27-02-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - LUBRICATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to lubricate the two check valves of the baggage compartment. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 21-27-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - REMOVAL AMM TASK 21-27-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT FAN - INSTALLATION BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT CHECK VALVES - OP- AMM TASK 21-27-02-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 813 Rear fuselage I 272 272DR Rear fuselage I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Molykote DC-33 Grease, light consistency AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Aft electronic compartment and baggage 1 Does the task compartment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 21-27-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation (Figure 301) SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: • MAKE SURE THAT THE AIRCRAFT IS DEENERGIZED AND SAFE FOR MAINTENANCE. • ON THE CIRCUIT BREAKER PANEL, OPEN THE RECIRC FAN CIRCUIT BREAKER AND ATTACH A DO-NOT-CLOSE TAG TO IT. (1) Remove door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) On the Aft Electronic Compartment, remove the Baggage Compartment Fan ( AMM TASK 21-27-01-000-801-A/400). Refer to sheet 1 of Figure 301. (3) On the Baggage Compartment, remove the guard assembly of the check valve. Refer to sheet 2 of Figure 301. J. Lubricate Baggage Compartment Check Valves (Figure 301) SUBTASK 640-002-A (1) Lubricate the check valves with Molykote DC-33 light grease. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Operationally Check Baggage Compartment Check Valves ( AMM TASK 21-27-02-700-801-A/500) to make sure that the check valves are free to move. (2) In the Aft Electronic Compartment, install the Baggage Compartment Fan ( AMM TASK 21-27-01-400-801-A/400). (3) In the Baggage Compartment, install the check valve guard assembly. (4) Install door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (5) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the RECIRC FAN circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 21-27-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
